name: Connection Lost (BurnsBoy)
description:
Take control of robots as they face existential questions like: "If I share consciousness with another being and I die, am I truly dead?"  "How can we prove free will exists?" "What is the purpose of completing this level?"

 
Send  robots to their doom just so you can open a door! Connect with other robots after casually disposing of them! Traverse platforms, push buttons,  all that fun stuff! Just be sure not to lose all connection!
